name: LUNAR ECLIPSE
description:
The Lunar Eclipse ring features a matte-finished 'pearl' sphere of perfectly molded sterling silver. Symbolizing the alignment of the Sun, Earth and Moon, it is set with a single gem juxtaposed alongside a perfectly polished 'crater'. Trillion-cut side gems set on a polished sterling silver ring-base add an elegant touch to this bold ring.

Turn this ring upside down and dangle it on a delicate ball-chain for a unique, one of a kind necklace.

Ring of sterling silver set with a 3.5mm brilliant-cut center Swarovski zirconia and two 4.5mm trillions-cut Swarovski zirconia.

name: SUPERNOVA
description:
The charm of the Supernova ring is the highly polished reflective inner surface that is partially visible through asymmetrical eyelets on the matte-finished upper shield. The unmistakeable shine of sterling silver reflects and retracts while the contrasts of matte and shine; dark and light; solid and hollow express themselves beautifully on this sculptured statement ring.

Ring of sterling silver set with a one 2.5mm brilliant-cut Swarovski zirconia.

name: WARP
description:
Influenced by outer space 'holes', the Warp pendant features a shiny, fluid, organic face that inspires by being asymmetrical and perfect all at once, just as nature is.

This whimsical pendant invites you to exercise your freedom - Hang it from either or both holes for an array of different looks.

Pendant of sterling silver.

This pendant comes with a 36" (90cm) black suede cord with lobster clasp.

name: HALLEY
description:
Inspired by celestial objects of ice and dust, the Halley ring breathtakingly spirals from a large center gem to a tail cluster of smaller glistening gems. This ring delicately coils around your finger in perfect 'symmetrical asymmetry'.

This ring is available in either matte or polished sterling silver.

Ring of sterling silver set with one 6.5mm brilliant-cut center Swarovski zirconia and twenty-two 2.0mm pave-set brilliant-cut Swarovski zirconia.

name: THIRD EYE
description:
Inspired by ancient mysticism and symbolizing 'clarity' and the protective 'third eye', this versatile design consists of two rings that can be worn stacked on any one finger or one each on two different fingers. Dangled on a chain, it also doubles perfectly as a simple yet chic necklace. This piece comes with a DIAZ signature 'poppy-seed' oxidized silver chain.

Rings and chain of sterling silver.

name: AURORA
description:
Much like the natural light displays in the polar skies, this ring glistens unexpectedly. The Aurora rings feature strategically placed 'peepholes' through which light penetrates to reflect on the shiny surface directly below. The sheer beauty and versatility of sterling silver is the pride and joy of this ring as is proven by the high-polished 'mirror' surface.

The two rings can be worn together, stacked for a bold effect or alone for a more subdued look.

Ring of sterling silver.

name: LUNAE LUX
description:
Reminiscent of the smooth silhouette of pebbles and planets, the Lunae Lux ring features a tender and sensual curve that is accentuated by a matte-finish. The continuous streamlined shape and single-set gem allows it to double as a pendant when turned upside-down.

Ring of sterling silver set with one 2.5mm brilliant-cut Swarovski zirconia.

This pendant comes with a 36" (90cm) black suede cord with lobster clasp or a 30" (76cm) sterling silver ball-chain with ring clasp.

name: BE BOPP-I
description:
The Be Bopp series of rings feature a deliciously smooth biomorphic comet-inspired 'sculpture' that sits on a generously wide sterling silver band.  Each ring is individually hand finished to allow the unmistakeable natural gleam of pure silver to shine through parts of this mostly matte-finished ring.

The Be Bopp-I ring fits comfortably on your finger, gently overflowing to skim adjacent fingers for a dramatic statement look.

Ring of sterling silver set with ten  2.5mm brilliant-cut Swarovski zirconia.

*Each piece is absolutely unique and may vary slightly in shine, shade and texture

name: BE BOPP-II
description:
The Be Bopp series of rings feature a deliciously smooth biomorphic comet-inspired 'sculpture' that sits on a generously wide sterling silver band. Each ring is individually hand finished to allow the unmistakeable natural gleam of pure silver to shine through parts of this mostly matte-finished ring.

The Be Bopp-II ring's sensual curves are accentuated by a single strategically off-center gem.  Wear it with the gem pointing towards your fingertips for one look, and turn it for a different feel.

Ring of sterling silver set with one 2.5mm brilliant-cut Swarovski zirconia.

*Each piece is absolutely unique and may vary slightly in shine, shade and texture

name: INFINITE
description:
Inspired by the universal symbol for 'infinity', this magical ring dipicts the symbol in abstract form that can only be seen from directly above. 

This is a simple, fluid recycled silver ring that forms an elegant shape, fitting the finger comfortably. It can be worn effortlessly in any direction or rotation as it cleverly produces an illusion of morphing from one design to another with the flick of the wrist.

The beauty and elegance of this design is as present in the spaces between the infinate single line as in the silver ring itself. This ring can also be worn as a pendant.

Ring of sterling silver.

name: RE0001
description:
Each piece in the 'RE' collection is made from 100% reclaimed silver and symbolizes the best 're' words - reinvent, renew, refresh, respect, rethink!

This unique, beautifully textured spiral design is meticulously hand crafted, making it a one-of-a-kind statement piece that really does make a statement on sustainability and sensitivity.

Ring of sterling silver set with one 4.5mm brilliant-cut Swarovski zirconia.

*Each piece is absolutely unique and may vary slightly in shine, shade and texture

name: RE0002
description:
Each piece in the 'RE' collection is made from 100% reclaimed silver and symbolizes the best 're' words - reinvent, renew, refresh, respect, rethink!

This unique, beautifully textured spiral design is meticulously hand crafted, making it a one-of-a-kind statement piece that really does make a statement on sustainability and sensitivity.

Ring of sterling silver set with one 4.5mm brilliant-cut Swarovski zirconia.

*Each piece is absolutely unique and may vary slightly in shine, shade and texture

name: RE0004
description:
Each piece in the 'RE' collection is made from 100% reclaimed silver and symbolizes the best 're' words - reinvent, renew, refresh, respect, rethink!

This smooth, asymmetrical silver ring is meticulously handcrafted into a perfect spiral - simplicity and sturdiness makes this a timeless design with a modern yet classy look. This is a bold ring with a masculine feel, perfect for those who prefer a 'chunky' or stacked ring look.
Ring of sterling silver.

*Each piece is absolutely unique and may vary slightly in shine and shade

name: RE0005
description:
Each piece in the 'RE' collection is made from 100% reclaimed silver and symbolizes the best 're' words - reinvent, renew, refresh, respect, rethink!

A perfect dew drop shape makes this ring a unique one that fits surprisingly comfortable on the finger. A playful design that allows the wearer to wear it pointing in any direction, it is truely one-of-a-kind.
Ring of sterling silver.

*Each piece is absolutely unique and may vary slightly in shine and shade

name: RE0008
description:
Each piece in the 'RE' collection is made from 100% reclaimed silver and symbolizes the best 're' words - reinvent, renew, refresh, respect, rethink!

Meticulously handcrafted using remnants of silver cuff bangles, these earrings are elegantly sleek with a whimsical twist making them the perfect pair for any occasion, from casual to formal.

Earrings of sterling silver set with 4.5mm brilliant-cut Swarovski zirconia.

name: RE0009
description:
Each piece in the 'RE' collection is made from 100% reclaimed silver and symbolizes the best 're' words - reinvent, renew, refresh, respect, rethink!

This contemporary design combines a braided cord of black reclaimed vintage kimono silk with reclaimed silver to form a bold, chic statement bracelet. There are subtle differences in shades and woven patterns within the kimono silk, a subtlety so delicate and deliberately subdued. Trace each thread of silk and see a myriad of colors woven into the pure black threads. 

The knots allow for an adjustable fit.

Bracelet of reclaimed sterling silver and vintage kimono silk.

*Each piece is absolutely unique and may vary slightly in shine, shade and texture

name: IWA ROCK
description:
The Iwa Rock necklace features a weathered natural rock cast in sterling silver and oxidized. Inspired by the strength and bold elegance of rocks that intertwine with roots and vines, the rock is held in place by 'roots' that are high polished for a beautiful contrast.

Every piece is delicately handcrafted and individually treated to look rustic with a matching oxidized silver 'poppy-seed' ball chain.

Pendant of sterling silver.

This pendant comes with a 30" (76cm) signature ‘poppyseed chain’ ™ (oxidized sterling silver ball-chain) with ring clasp.

name: FIGROOT DOME
description:
Inspired by the 'obi-dome' charms that were popularized by geisha in Japan, this unique silver charm comes with an adjustable black silk cord made of reclaimed vintage kimono. Wear it as a long necklace, a choker, or as a casual wrap around wrist accessory.

The partially oxidized handmolded sculpture-like effect adds a special touch to this eye-catching design. This is an exotic, versatile, one-of-a-kind piece that is sure to delight.

Pendant of sterling silver.

This pendant comes with a 36" (90cm) black silk cord.

*Each piece is absolutely unique and may vary slightly in shine, shade and texture.

name: SABI
description:
Inspired by the beauty and element of surprise of geodes, Sabi features a bold sterling silver pendant that is crystal-encrusted with amethyst that peeks out with understated subtlety. The sheer beauty that is within is celebrated in this one-of-a-kind piece.

This pendant has a slight tarnished finish to compliment the look of natural amethyst.

Pendant of sterling silver and amethyst.

This pendant comes with a 36" (90cm) black suede cord with lobster clasp.

*Each piece is absolutely unique and may vary slightly in shine, shade and texture.

name: FIGROOT-WHITE
description:
This biomorphic and organic design is inspired by the understated charm, strength and beauty of intertwining roots and vines. The polished recycled silver ring has a sculpture-like effect, making it an eye-catching design that guarantees to make a statement with its rustic, edgy appearance.

This ring can be paired with the Figroot Dome Necklace.

Ring of sterling silver.

*Each piece is absolutely unique and may vary slightly in shine, shade and texture.

name: FIGROOT-BLACK
description:
This biomorphic and organic design is inspired by the understated charm, strength and beauty of intertwining roots and vines. The partially oxidized recycled silver ring has a sculpture-like effect, making it an eye-catching design that guarantees to make a statement with its rustic, edgy appearance.

This ring can be paired with the Figroot Dome Necklace.

Ring of sterling silver.

*Each piece is absolutely unique and may vary slightly in shine, shade and texture.

name: BON-II
description:
The Bon rings feature a luscious 'carved & molded' look. A single polished ocean jasper is framed in an organic tray or 'bon'. The unique color and pattern of each stone is embraced and enhanced with a hand-polished finish that is custom matched to the look and feel of each stone.

This beautiful stone is no longer mined, making it a rare stone to be treasured. The positive vibrations of ocean jasper make it a stone of joy.

name: BON-I
description:
The Bon rings feature a luscious 'carved & molded' look. A single polished ocean jasper is framed in an organic tray or 'bon'. The unique color and pattern of each stone is embraced and enhanced with a hand-polished finish that is custom matched to the look and feel of each stone.

This beautiful stone is no longer mined, making it a rare stone to be treasured. The positive vibrations of ocean jasper make it a stone of joy.

Ring of sterling silver and ocean jasper.

*Each piece is absolutely unique and may vary in color, shine, shade and texture

name: Brilliant Solitaire 1ct
description:
Pendant of sterling silver with a 1 carat size Swarovski Zirconia gem.

This pendant comes with a 16" (40cm) snake chain.

The sterling silver pendant is Rhodium plated in order to prevent it from tarnishing.

name: Brilliant Solitaire
description:
Pendant of sterling silver with a 2 carat size Swarovski Zirconia gem.

This pendant comes with a 16" (40cm) snake chain.

The sterling silver pendant is Rhodium plated in order to prevent it from tarnishing.

name: Pave Bail Pendant
description:
Pendant of sterling silver with 1.71 carat size Swarovski Zirconia gem.

This pendant comes with a 16" (40cm) snake chain.
Main gem: 6.0 mm
Side gems: 2.0 mm

The sterling silver pendant is Rhodium plated in order to prevent it from tarnishing.

name: Cassiopeia
description:
Pendant of sterling silver with 5 Swarovski Zirconia gems.
(5.0mm 4.0mm(x2) 3.5mm 3.0mm gems)

This pendant comes with a 16" (40cm) snake chain.

The sterling silver pendant is Rhodium plated in order to prevent it from tarnishing.

name: Cuore
description:
Pendant of sterling silver with 12 Swarovski Zirconia gems. 
(2.25 mm x12 gems)

This pendant comes with a 16" (40cm) snake chain.

The sterling silver pendant is Rhodium plated in order to prevent it from tarnishing.

name: Tesorino
description:
Pendant of sterling silver with a 0.25 carat Swarovski Zirconia gem (4.0mm).

This pendant comes with a 16" (40cm) snake chain.

The sterling silver pendant is Rhodium plated in order to prevent it from tarnishing.

name: Angela
description:
Pendant of sterling silver with a 1.94 carat princess-cut Swarovski Zirconia gem (6.0mm).

This pendant comes with a 16" (40cm) snake chain.

The sterling silver pendant is Rhodium plated in order to prevent it from tarnishing.

name: Cristallino
description:
Pendant of sterling silver with a 3.24 carat size Swarovski Zirconia gem (7.0 x 9.0 mm).

This pendant comes with a 16" (40cm) snake chain.

The sterling silver pendant is Rhodium plated in order to prevent it from tarnishing.

name: Lume
description:
Pendant of sterling silver with 0.2 carat Swarovski Zirconia gems (2.25 mm).

This pendant comes with a 16" (40cm) snake chain.

The sterling silver pendant is Rhodium plated in order to prevent it from tarnishing.

name: Celeste
description:
Pendant of sterling silver with 0.44 carat size Swarovski Zirconia gems (2.25 mm x 11).

This pendant comes with a 16" (40cm) snake chain. 

The sterling silver pendant is Rhodium plated in order to prevent it from tarnishing.

name: Fortuna
description:
Pendant of sterling silver with Swarovski Zirconia gems (4.5mm x 7).

This pendant comes with a 16" (40cm) snake chain.

The sterling silver pendant is Rhodium plated in order to prevent it from tarnishing.
